nhc_headline: ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, STRONG WINDS AND TORRENTIAL  RAINFALL BATTERING EASTERN TEXAS... ...600 AM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, STRONG WINDS AND TORRENTIAL  RAINFALL BATTERING EASTERN TEXAS... ...600 AM CDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 6:00 AM CDT Mon Jul 8
 the center of Beryl was located near 29.0, -95.9
 with movement N at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 979 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
